job_title: Health Care Aide in Hamilton, ON

pros: With everything going on with the pandemic, Thrive was always focused on the safety of the residents/clients/staff, one step ahead of most organizations in protecting everyone. They are a company who not only say but show their appreciation for all of their staff's hard work during the pandemic and pre-pandemic. They are also big on promoting and training staff within the organization. This is the first company I have worked for where they saw my potential and created a plan for my success before starting a new role.
cons: None that I can think of

review_title: Not a great company to work with
